item.title: Same Blog, Different Build. On to Hugo!
item.description: I migrated my blog to Hugo! I’ve been using Jekyll to build my blogging site for the past couple years but I read that it is no longer actively supported.

item.title: Musings on AI pt 2
item.description: Though I don’t feel anything from pt 1 was incorrect, I wanted lend a bit more credulity to AI and Machine Learning work. I’m gonna reference mostly work and posts from a machine learning engineer and tech writer I follow, Vicki Boykis.

item.title: Musings on AI
item.description: I’m trying to get in the habit of blogging a bit more frequently so this will seem less collected than other posts. I’ve largely avoided tinkering too much with the various generative AI tools.

item.title: The Bear show us how to grow
item.description: (Minor spoilers for The Bear season 2 lie ahead) Episode four of season two of The Bear takes a slight detour from a Chicago family restaurant aiming to reinvent itself to a high-end kitchen in the Netherlands.

item.title: Please don't make me kill
item.description: A WSJ op-ed made its rounds through my little corner of lefty twitter. I’m not a subscriber, so I did not read it. Take this post with however big a grain of salt you feel appropriate.
